name: Revy - Balalaika - Roberta | Black Lagoon
description:
v2.0: Added Balalaika and Roberta. Revy's appearance should also be more consistent.

v1.0: Gun anatomy can be difficult to get right so I included a separate trigger word for the guns, which can be put in the negative prompt if you prefer. The tattoo can be inconsistent but can be fixed with inpainting.
